thread.title: Tips on using new iPhone feature for animating still photos
thread.title_full: Tips on using new iPhone feature for animating still photos

title: Tips on using new iPhone feature for animating still photos
text: Tips on using new iPhone feature for animating still photos By Associated Press | September 24, 2015 @ 9:32 pm Lucy an Atomic 212 Robot with an image of owner on Facetime stands third in the line to purchase the new iPhone 6S, outside the Apple Store, in Sydney, Australia, Friday, Sept. 25, 2015. The robot, controlled via the 4G network allows owner Lucy Kelly of Sydney to finalize her purchase of a new iPhone 6S remotely. Apple is counting on sales of the new iPhones to maintain its position as one of the most profitable, and valuable, companies in the world. (AP Photo/Glenn Nicholls)
